page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content:
I like the houses in{Mapledurwell(M)} but if I had to live there I would not be very happy. I like the countryside there but I think it would be better if it was not near the motorway. It seems so isolated there are no shops. The houses in M are nice and I would like to have a cottage but not there. In M there is very limited bus service and very few phone boxes. To live in M you would need your mum and dad to drive you to places,M is a long way from the shops and school.There is no dentist and the roads are narrow to drive on.There is nothing to do in the evenings.
I like living in{Up Nately}because it is nice and quiet. It has a riding school and the canal running through it. It is nice living in U.N. because lots of people have swimming pools.
